abstract: According to figures compiled by HSBC Private Bank, some familiar names among activist hedge funds are suffering a record worst start to the year, with some losses posted at more than 20 percent.
lead_paragraph: According to figures compiled by HSBC Private Bank, some familiar names among activist hedge funds are suffering a record worst start to the year, with some losses posted at more than 20 percent.

headline.main: Big Hedge Funds Said to Post Big Losses
